name: Grace and Mercy Personal Care and Respite Service, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Grace and Mercy Personal Care and Respite Service, LLC is a Homemaker provider based in Clinton, MS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $93.2M in Medicaid payments across 863K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $93.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
